Name: Paradise Lofts
About the game: PARADISE LOFTS is a slow-burning, noir, hardcore sex romp, set in the fictitious town of Paradise in 1958. The story begins as our hero moves into his new apartment, eager to kickstart his new career and new life with his girlfriend, Penny. The only problem is, you're fired on your first day moving in, and your girlfriend dumps you. As you struggle to find work and meet new people, you are thrust into mystery and mayhem, after witnessing the murder of a neighbor. An open world environment allows you to develop new skills as you progress through the game, eventually working your way to becoming the most sought-after private dick in Paradise. It's a world filled with models and wannabe actresses, mobsters and corrupt politicians. Chapter One contains approximately 8 to 12 hours of gameplay, with non-linear story-telling and multiple ways to solve puzzles and get past challenges. This visual novel game is filled with mini-games, adventures, and over-the-top comedy galore.
